item.title: Conlang tools in Rust
item.description: Hello there and welcome! This is my first my post, and I will talk about my journey in the world of conlanging and rust. What is a conlang I don’t know if you already heard about the term of conlang, but if you don’t, let me introduce this term to you. Conlang means CONstructed LANGuage and the can have lot of use-cases. It can be for a fantasy universe, like Sindarin (elvish) in the Lord of Ring universe.
